general.gigTitle: be your full stack web developer with react nodejs  and mongodb

sellerCard.oneLiner: Solutions that Work Smarter, Not Harder, for Your Business
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I'm Zain Rafique, a web developer with 7+ years of experience building high-quality, responsive web applications. My expertise includes:

React & Angular: Dynamic, interactive UIs.
JavaScript: Clean, scalable code.
Bootstrap: Modern, mobile-friendly designs.
MongoDB & MySQL: Efficient database management.
I deliver customized solutions with a focus on quality and timely delivery. Let’s bring your project to life—contact me today!

description.content:
Ready to build a top-notch web application? With 7 years of experience as a full-stack developer, I create high-quality websites using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Whether you need a responsive site or a powerful app, I deliver modern, efficient solutions tailored to your needs.


What You'll Get:

  • Responsive Design: Mobile-friendly and adaptable to all devices.
  • Cross-Browser Support: Ensures accessibility on major browsers.
  • High Performance: Optimized for seamless user experience.
  • Custom Features: Tailored functionality and API integrations.
  • Pixel-Perfect Design: Accurately reflects your brand.


Why Choose Me:

  • Experienced: 7 years in full-stack development.
  • Quality Assurance: Adheres to best practices and industry standards.


What I Need:

  • Project Details: Design preferences and required features.
  • Assets: Logos, images, and text content.
  • References: Examples of sites you like.


Contact me to start your project and achieve your web goals!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use for full-stack development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: use React for front-end development, Node.js for back-end services, and MongoDB for database management. This combination ensures a modern, scalable, and efficient web application.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How many pages or features are included in each package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Basic Package: Up to 2 pages
Standard Package: Up to 5 pages, including API integration and user authentication
Premium Package: Up to 10 pages with advanced features and custom API implementation

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize the design of the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can customize the design in premium package  based on your requirements. Please provide your design preferences or any reference sites you like.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need from me to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need information about your project goals, design preferences, functionality requirements, and any content or assets you want to include in the website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate third-party services or APIs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I can integrate various third-party services and APIs as part of the development process, depending on your project requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer revisions based on the package chosen. Please check the package details for the number of revisions included.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: A responsive 3-page website built with modern tools like React or Next.Js

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Get a fully customized 5-page website with React, Node.js, MongoDB and advanced functionality.

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: Advanced Full Stack Web App with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Custom Features - Up to 10 Pages

reviews.comment:
I recently had the pleasure of working with AR Creations, and I can confidently say they are an exceptional software house. From the very beginning, their team demonstrated professionalism, expertise, and a genuine commitment to delivering top-notch results.

Their ability to understand my requirements and translate them into a seamless solution was truly impressive. The attention to detail, creative input, and timely delivery surpassed all expectations. They kept me informed at every step, ensuring a smooth and stress-free collaboration.

The end product was nothing short of outstanding—perfectly tailored to my needs and executed flawlessly. It’s rare to find a company that combines technical excellence with such outstanding customer service, but AR Creations does just that.

I give them a well-deserved 10/10 for their fantastic work and highly recommend their services to anyone in need of innovative and reliable software solutions. Kudos to the entire AR Creations team for a job well done! 👏

AR Creations did an outstanding job with my mobile app development task! Their expertise in React Native is truly impressive. They efficiently implemented advanced features such as state management with Redux, seamless API integrations, and responsive UI components. The team also ensured smooth navigation using React Navigation and handled cross-platform compatibility with precision. Their attention to detail and commitment to delivering quality work exceeded my expectations. I highly appreciate their skills and dedication. Highly recommended!

Ar Creations did an incredible job! His expertise in the MERN stack is outstanding. He efficiently handled both frontend and backend tasks, ensuring seamless functionality, a polished user interface, and clean, well-documented code. Highly recommend working with him for any web development project!
He was fast, professional and delivered a functional and impressive website according to my guidelines. I will be back for more projects soon.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure collaborating with you. I'm thrilled to hear that you were satisfied with the project. Looking forward to working together again in the future!

reviews.comment: Arcreations did an AMAZING job! The work was professional with expert-level coding and thorough documentation, plus their proactive communication and seamless cooperation made the process so smooth. Highly recommend working with them! 👍
